item.description:
One of the satire-parody movies mocking the bestest genre ever, super-heroes. I'm REALLY looking forward to this one. :-)
NOTE: for shows not playing in New Haven, I'll try picking some at the North Haven theatre in the future. For this one, though, I have some co-workers coming, so Branford will be easier for them.
We can meet at six at the nearby restaurant for food and drinks if anyone is interested. They have great chips and salsa for free. There's also a good diner nearby. Both are options for before or after. Please state your interest in your response.

Showtime is 7:25. Lets meet at the theatre at 7:15 and take seats at showtime.

Trailers: http://movies.go.com/...

Synopsis:

Rick Riker (Drake Bell) is just your average ordinary dorky teenager until he's bitten by a genetically altered dragonfly. Acquiring the bug's powers, Rick transforms himself into the superhero the Dragonfly. He also gets his own supervillain to fight: the Hourglass (Christopher McDonald), who has the ability to steal a person's lifeforce. This comedy spoofs both the Spider-Man movies and other superflicks.

-Neil
203-645-2008
item.name: Movies and muchies: Super-hero Movie
